text: Bigos is a traditional dish from Poland and Lithuania. Bigos is created from cabbage (normal and sauerkraut) and meat. In very rare cases bigos can be made without meat or cabbage, but the presence of sauerkraut is absolutely essential. == Other websites == *Bigos in wikinew`s cookbook Category:Polish food Category:Lithuanian food Category:Cabbage dishes Category:Meat dishes
title: Bigos
